description:
It’s been over three years since Ela has played with electricity, and WE were the last ones to shock her. Hmm, seems like this slut has been saving herself for us! How thoughtful! As a thanks, we decided to completely cover her tight body with electro pads and turn her into a convulsing, cummy mess. And that was just the beginning.

Ela’s next thank you comes in the form of a big, fat mushroom-tipped violet wand shoved up her pussy and some tzapping to her sensitive soles. The samurai and an electro cock, with their levels turned up EXTREMELY high, deliver a deep fucking and she is made to eat Mistress Lorelei’s pussy until there is cum all over Ela’s face and body. Some anal training with an electro plug and the cattle prod finish off our appreciation package, and no, we don’t think Ela will ever wait this long to get worked over by us again. This beautiful woman is a TRUE Electroslut!
title: Ela and the Electricity: A Reunion
